application_details: Applicant was absent for 876 days, failing the 1,095-day requirement
decision_reasoning: The judge applied the physical presence test, which aligns with statutory interpretation principles
conclusion_outcome: No error occurred in applying the physical presence test; appeal dismissed
procedure_followed: Appeal based on the record before the Citizenship Judge, governed by Federal Courts Rules
result_of_case: Appeal dismissed; physical presence test upheld as correct interpretation of residency requirement
